settings.title: RETURNS
settings.content:
Our return policy includes your choice of a refund or store credit.

Click our Returns Portal to start your return.

To get in touch, email contact@yllwthelabel.com

settings.title: STAY CONNECTED
settings.content: Drop your email for new releases:

settings.title: Ebie Hepworth
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: EBIE HEPWORTH / The Ebie Sweatshirt
settings.content: Ebie has years of experience building nonprofits and businesses, and now she changes the world by being an adoptive mom. We named the Ebie Sweatshirt after her to celebrate her choice of adoption. Listen to her IGTV on our Instagram and follow her at @ebiehepworth!

settings.title: Kendall Green
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: KENDALL GREEN   /  The Kendall Top
settings.content: Kendall Green is a practicing nurse, Georgia native, and brainiac with a creative side. We named the Kendall Top after her to celebrate nurses everywhere! @astoldbykendall

settings.title: Savvy Shields
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: SAVVY SHIELDS / The Savvy Dress
settings.content: A former Miss America, an artist, and a bundle of joy... We named the Savvy S. Dress after @savvyjanine!

settings.title: Kalie Korfe
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: KALIE KORFE / The Kalie Dress
settings.content: Kalie is the event venue entrepreneur of Stonehill Farm in Minnesota. We named the Kalie Dress after @kaliewrightkorfe to celebrate her going for the dream of owning an event venue!

settings.title: Vanessa Oblinsky
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: VANESSA OBLINSKY /  The Vanessa Shorts
settings.content: @vanessaoblinsky is a Canada native, military wife in San Diego, fashion expert, and mother of two boys. We named the Vanessa Shorts after to celebrate her impeccable style and her sacrifice as a military wife!

settings.title: Jess Bevere
settings.subheading: #YELLYELLOW to name items after women doing great things!
settings.heading: JESS BEVERE / The Jess Dress
settings.content: @jessicabevere is a funky, brilliant gal living in Colorado Springs, Colorado. Her creative genius as an artist caused us to name the Jess Dress after her!
